title: My pixel phone is always turning off when picturing using flash. I need a solution asap 🙏🏼🙏🏼🙏🏼
content:
every time I want to take a picture of sth when my phone is not plugged in it turns off and this happens with every app (even with the stock camera app, with instagram and WhatsApp) 
I've tried resetting my phone into factory configuration and nothing happened
I need a solution asap, or i'd turn it back
